title: KP CM  unveils Digital KP 2020 logo
content:
PESHAWAR, Feb 12 (APP):Chief Minister Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Mahmood Khan Wednesday formally unveiled Digital Khyber Pakhtunkhwa 2020 logo inauguration of the digital transformation system in the province to keep pace with fast-changing digital economy of the modern day.
Digital Khyber Pakhtunkhwa 2020 logo was unfolded at a special ceremony aiming to have a viable digital policy for the KP to help turn around the entire public sector’s departments.
The chief minister said that digital technology was reshaping economies and the KP Government move of digital transformation would help to overcome all the modern challenges. The KP was the first province which had digital policy and during the current year all departments would prepare a digital policy to put their working on modern lines and make it hassle free through digitization process.
He said the current year would be digital transformation year in the province to make administrative affairs receptive to current day’s requirements and different activities in this regard would be taking place throughout the year. He said that reforms under the digitization move would be implemented in letter and spirit on fast track like T-20 cricket match.
He said digitization figured high on the government’s priority list and in this regard no compromise would be made to fully capitalize on those reform-based initiatives.
